title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Skills: Reading Comprehension for 3rd Graders Using a Tiered Reading Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic reading comprehension and word recognition skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners achieve comprehension improvement from 55.84% to 65.94% or higher in standardized reading assessments within four weeks.
Learners can reconstruct the sequence of events (Sequencing) in given texts with 80% accuracy.
Learners achieve a 75% or higher correct answer rate in cause-and-effect (Cause and Effect) analysis problems.
Learners can distinguish facts (Fact) from opinions (Opinion) with 90% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate a 70% or higher success rate in text-based inference and conclusion-drawing (Making Inferences) problems.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
